posts.content: Hi,I've created an App that allows you to enter the channel ID and read key to display your graph.You can find it here https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/2253850/ThingSpeak1.apk
posts.author: gadjet

posts.content: Awesome! Thanks for sharing the app with the community. Are you planning on putting the source code on GitHub?
posts.author: Hans

posts.content: Hi Gadjet,app looks fine!! Is it just display only one graph? I have added the channel ID and the API KEY, And it is displaying only one graph.Thanks!
posts.author: vespapierre

posts.content: Hi Guys,I've posted a really simple android application on github:https://github.com/mattyw/PublicSandpit/tree/master/android At the moment you just enter your channel id and it will get the channel name and the last recorded value for feed1. It's very simple but feel free to add stuff to it Matt
posts.author: mattyw
